page.title: 19Media in Llanelli.
page.content: Llanelli has its own local weekly newspaper-the Llanelli Star.It is the only survivor of the four that were once available.There is also a free advertising paper which appears weekly. Television reception in Llanelli is good for the four channels broadcast in Wales,but reception of Channel Four is not so good.We have S4C. All BBC Radio Broadcasts are easily received.We can also tune in to a Commercial Radio Station-Swansea Sound. The Borough Council encourage the writing of books on local history. Three have been published by them so far,and othere are in the course of preparation.
